greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of multiply-perfect numbers.
comment: When sorted, this is A081756. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 03 2019
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, my(s=sigma(n)); if (! (s % n), print1(s, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 26 2019
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Apr 26 2019
